      Constructor of the gold card class
      Parameters:
      cardID - : id of the card
      frontCorners - : corners that the front of the card has
      frontCornersContent - : game items that the front of the card has
      placementScore - : placement score
      permanentResources - : list of permanent game resources that the back of the card has
      placementCondition - : placement condition
      scoringCondition - : scoring condition
